virtual ~OpenWindowAction ()

Detailed Description

Opens a window modal or modeless, if it is executed.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

OpenWindowAction::OpenWindowAction (   ) 
 

If the default constructor is used, the parameters have to be provided by using the method Init.

OpenWindowAction::OpenWindowAction (  Dispatcher *  dispatcher,
Window *  win,
const WString &  text,
const ImageObtainer &  icon = ImageObtainer(),
BOOLEAN  modal = FALSE
) 
 

Parameters:
dispatcher Dispatcher which will be informed about property changes. Usually a window or control is used as dispatcher.
win Pointer to the window, which should be opened.
text Text of the item. The GUI-component using the item decides whether the text will be shown.
icon Icon of the item. The GUI-component using the item decides whether the icon will be shown.
modal TRUE to open the window modal, FALSE to open it modeless.

OpenWindowAction::~OpenWindowAction (   )  [virtual]

const WCHAR *  text = 0,
const BitmapRes *  bitmap = 0,
BOOLEAN  enabled = TRUE
) 
 

Obsolete - use constructor with a dispatcher as input-parameter instead.

Parameters:
win Pointer to the window, which should be opened.

Member Function Documentation

BOOLEAN OpenWindowAction::Execute (   )  [virtual]
 

Opens the window, which was set with the constructor or the method Init.

Reimplemented from Action.

const GuiObjectFactory::PropertyId  prop_id,
UINT16  object_id
) 
 

Initializes the instance by reading out a resource file generated by ARAGON. This method may not be invoked by the MMI in a direct manner and might be changed in future releases.
